<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Devastating Spellstrike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2853) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 44 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Arcane Cascade](/Actions.aspx?ID=756), [inexorable iron hybrid study](/HybridStudies.aspx?ID=1), [Spellstrike](/Actions.aspx?ID=755)

**Requirements**
You are in Arcane Cascade stance and your Spellstrike is charged.

</column>

---

Your Spellstrike sweeps are so wide and devastating, they splash onto nearby foes. Make a Spellstrike. Foes adjacent to the target take [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage equal to 2 + the extra damage from Arcane Cascade. The damage type is the same as Arcane Cascade; if the spell already deals splash damage of the same type, combine the damage together before applying weaknesses or resistances.
